lead_paragraph: The Pittsburgh Penguins agreed to a new three-year contract with Coach Michel Therrien that includes a raise for this season and goes through the 2010-11 season, expected to be the team’s first in a new arena.
snippet: The Pittsburgh Penguins agreed to a new three-year contract with Coach Michel Therrien that includes a raise for this season and goes through the 2010-11 season, expected to be the team’s first in a new arena.
